title: Six children among latest Ebola cases in Uganda’s capital as outbreak grows
description: Officials say they will test three experimental vaccines in the coming weeks.

title: Redditor acquires decommissioned Netflix cache server with 262TB of storage
description: 2013-era server offers rare peek under the hood of Netflix's Open Connect network.

title: InSight and Mars orbiter use impacts to give new info on Mars’ interior
description: The largest impacts in 16 years kicks up water ice, seismic waves.

title: Report: Apple will release a 16-inch iPad Pro
description: Despite speculation, we don't believe this means the iPad and Mac will merge.

title: Section 230 shields TikTok in child’s “Blackout Challenge” death lawsuit
description: Mourning mom can't beat Section 230 by "creatively labeling" claims, judge says.

title: “Old/weird laptops” sought to help test Linux kernel backlight drivers
description: You could help smooth out a long-needed overhaul of Linux's backlight systems.

title: Fresh off of parole, Samsung heir ascends to chairman of the company
description: A presidential pardon clears the way for Samsung's criminal prince to be a king.

title: Argo AI will cease operations as Ford and Volkswagen pull investments
description: Ford is reallocating those resources to ADAS, VW's CARIAD will work with Bosch.

title: Apple clarifies security update policy: Only the latest OSes are fully patched
description: New document confirms what security researches have observed for a few years.

title: Russia threatens a retaliatory strike against US commercial satellites
description: "Western actions needlessly put at risk the sustainability of peaceful space activities."

title: Lego to discontinue Mindstorms robot line after a 24-year run
description: Lego to pull educational kit Dec. 2022, redirecting efforts into "different areas of the business."

title: Musk visits Twitter HQ, promises staff he won’t fire 75% of them
description: Musk carried a sink into Twitter HQ, told advertisers it won't be a "hellscape."

title: Today’s best deals: Google Pixel 6a, Apple MacBooks, 4K TVs, and more

title: Meta’s value plunges more than $65 billion amid falling sales, rising costs
